name: Hypochondriac
description: You need to finish the game with two medicines on your inventory

name: The best defense...
description: You need to finish the game with a gun and an ammunition in your possession

name: This is dangerous
description: You need to finish the game with a biker suit

name: Winter is coming
description: You need to finish the game with two gas cans

name: Masochist
description: You need to finish the game with only one point of life

name: No pain tolerance
description: You need to finish the game with all your life points intact

name: Looner
description: You need to finish the game with only one survivor on your team (the rest should dead)

name: Team Player
description: None of your survivors can dead
